full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO'I GSO SBYONG BLANG BA'I SGO NAS THUB DBANG GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA PHYAG MCHOD THUGS DAM BSKUL BA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
